title: Just Falafel - Bechara El Khoury
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Fast food, Take-out, Middle Eastern
description: Part of chain franchise offering falafel sandwiches in different international flavors. Dairy and cheese is used, so vegans need to specify. NOTE: As of 2015, this chain is serving meat in many of its locations - please verify if meat is served at this location and let HappyCow know!
